scripts.build:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild build -project example.xcodeproj -scheme example -sdk iphonesimulator ONLY_ACTIVE_ARCH=NO -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 6' -configuration Release -derivedDataPath build
scripts.test:ios: PLATFORM_NAME=ios NO_RESET=true AUTOMATION_NAME=xcuitest APP_PATH=`pwd`/ios/build/Build/Products/Release-iphonesimulator/example.app TESTS_PATH=test/*_test_*.js IGNORE_PATH=test/*_test_*.android.js babel-node ./test/utils/run.js
